name: Fitness Tracker
desc: A Fitness tracker to help users document their journey by uploading pictures and logging daily activities.

name: Cryptocurrency Prediction
desc: Uses Deep Learning Neural Network techniques RNN & LSTM together, to analyse and predict future trends of cryptocurrencies.

name: Driver Drowsiness detection
desc: A real time drowsiness detector by displaying drowsiness score and triggering automated alarms.

name: Deets
desc: A MERN based 'to-do' list that is backed up a NoSQL DB using CRUD operations.

name: Weather Finder
desc: A Real-time Weather Application that uses OAuth Authentcation and redirects them to weather information pages.

name: Journal Entry
desc: Allows user to compose their daily journals and keep a track of the journals written.

name: Blog Site
desc: A Blog website built on Restful APIs that allows users to create,edit, post and delete blog posts.

name: Record Linkage Prediction
desc: Indicates the % of vulnerability between two datasets by identifying the metrics of record linkage, and helps balancing privacy and utility.
